name: word-guess-game-cl
description: * This is Berkeley Coding Boot Camp (BCBC) week 6 homework assignment.     * The BCBC curriculum generally focuses on JavaScript along with HTML/CSS, using the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) software stack, to teach web development skills across the client and server.    * The Word Guess Game is a command-line node application that takes in parameters and returns data.     * The game randomly selects a word and prompts user for letter guesses until the word is guessed or number of guesses runs out.
